sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The DoIP functionality has been realized to implement the DoIP ISO protocol ISO 13400-2:2012 and the VW DoIP specific supplement LAH.DUM.907.AQ v2.6, required for diagnostic routing with DoIP_Edge. The main diagnostic routing paths handled by DoIP component are:
DoIP <-> CAN - route the diagnostic messages to corresponding CAN target (except AFS_CAN bus)
DoIP <-> LIN - route the diagnostic messages to corresponding LIN target
DoIP <-> DCM - route the diagnostic messages to internal DCM instance

blockquote.para: Note: Even if the MFL_CAN bus is physically connected to RCar, the diagnostic routing to this bus is performed by the DoIP component of Chorus because some ECUs of DK2/DK2F could be connected on this bus, and diagnostic routing to this type of ECUs is implemented only in Chorus side.
